contentrichtext.text: {{for|the railway station|Klepp Station}} {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} [[Image:Klepp stasjon.jpg|thumb|Klepp station]] '''Klepp stasjon''' is a village in the [[municipalities of Norway|municipality]] of [[Klepp]], located in the [[counties of Norway|county]] of [[Rogaland]], [[Norway]]. It is located by lake [[Frøylandsvatnet]]. When the [[Jæren Line]] was constructed in 1878, the administrative centre of Klepp ([[Kleppe]]) was somewhat offset from the convenient path of the railway, so the railway station serving Klepp was placed 3 km east of the centre. The village of ''Klepp stasjon'' (literally ''Klepp station'') grew up around the railway station. {{Coord|58|46|25|N|5|40|35|E|type:city_region:NO|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Klepp Stasjon}} [[Category:Villages in Rogaland]] [[Category:Klepp]] {{Rogaland-geo-stub}}
